column1: Little Goat Diner////There was only a small wait the first time and we got right in the second time.  The waitstaff was nice
column2: but the second time it felt like we had to wait quite awhile to order which was kind of annoying because there weren't that many people there.  That's why I docked a star.  Otherwise
column3: it was a great dining experience!  Hopefully at some point I can actually get into Girl and the Goat...
